blogPost.excerpt: Protect your ecommerce margins & increase average order value by blocking unwanted discount codes from coupon extensions like Honey, CapitalOne Shopping, Piggy, and more. Currently available for Shopify Plus users. Not Shopify Plus? Get on the wait list.
blogPost.body: Protect your ecommerce margins & increase average order value by blocking unwanted discount codes from coupon extensions like Honey, CapitalOne Shopping, Piggy, and more. Currently available for Shopify Plus users. Not Shopify Plus? Get on the wait list.
blogPost.title: cleanCART - Increase ecommerce profits by blocking coupon extensions
blogPost.author: Kathleen Booth

localize.description: 保护您的电子商务利润，并通过阻止不需要的折扣代码从优惠券扩展，如蜂蜜，CapitalOne购物，小猪，和更多的保护您的平均订单价值。目前适用于Shopify Plus用户。不是Shopify Plus用户？进入等待名单。
localize.tagline: 通过屏蔽优惠券扩展来增加电商利润

localize.description: 保護您的電子商務利潤，並通過阻止不需要的折扣代碼從優惠券擴展，如蜂蜜，CapitalOne購物，小豬，和更多的保護您的平均訂單價值。目前適用於Shopify Plus用戶。不是Shopify Plus用戶？進入等待名單。
localize.tagline: 通過屏蔽優惠券擴展來增加電商利潤

previous.excerpt: A time tracking app focused on life itself rather than projects, tasks, and more specific types. It helps to generalize a day and make it easier to document your life. It just takes 5 seconds to log your day. You don't have to remember each minute.
previous.title: Horae - Measure your life, log your hours and document your life

localize.description: 一款专注于生活本身的时间追踪应用，而不是项目、任务和更具体的类型。它有助于概括一天的生活，让你更容易记录生活。它只需要5秒钟就可以记录你的一天。你不必记住每一分钟。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，记录你的时间，记录你的生活。

localize.description: 一款專注於生活本身的時間追蹤應用，而不是項目、任務和更具體的類型。它有助於概括一天的生活，讓你更容易記錄生活。它只需要5秒鐘就可以記錄你的一天。你不必記住每一分鐘。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，記錄你的時間，記錄你的生活。

next.excerpt: Gladys Assistant is an open-source home automation software. It's easy to install on a Raspberry Pi, a NAS, or any machine running Linux.
next.title: Gladys Assistant v4 - A privacy-first, open-source home assistant

localize.description: 格莱迪助手是一款开源的家庭自动化软件。它很容易安装在Raspberry Pi、NAS或任何运行Linux的机器上。
localize.tagline: 一个隐私优先、开源的家庭助手
